scripts.dev:docker: pnpm run docker:project-a && pnpm run docker:project-b && pnpm run docker:nginx
scripts.docker:project-a: docker build -f apps/project-a/Dockerfile.development -t project-a-dev . && docker run --rm -d --name project-a-dev -p 5173:5173 project-a-dev
scripts.docker:project-b: docker build -f apps/project-b/Dockerfile.development -t project-b-dev . && docker run --rm -d --name project-b-dev -p 5174:5174 project-b-dev
scripts.docker:nginx: docker build -f nginx/Dockerfile.development -t nginx-dev ./nginx && docker run --rm -d --name nginx-dev -p 3000:80 nginx-dev
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop project-a-dev project-b-dev nginx-dev || true
scripts.build:prod: pnpm --filter project-a build && pnpm --filter project-b build
